#summary Quick Start Guide

  * = Steps to using Twilio Client in your GWT app =
    # Add gwt-twilio.jar to your projects classpath
    # Add a link to the Twilio Client javascript file to your html file
      {{{<script type="text/javascript" src="https://static.twilio.com/libs/twiliojs/1.0/twilio.min.js"></script>}}}
    # Inherit the Twilio module in your GWT Module File
      {{{<inherits name='com.xedge.twilio.GWTTwilio'/>}}}
    # Start coding...


= Code Snippets =
   'Device.setup(token);'   //Initialize Twilio.Device with a capability token
